review: Okay I've played some time and I am ready to write an honest good review of this trash pile of a game cause that's what it actually is. Another battle royal type game with good mechanics (not bad not perfect) good graphics and good gameplay. BUT the game is poorly made thus so many bugs still exist some mechanics are exceptionally idiotic (such as a vehicle going at 90+ km/h crashing into a stopped motorcycle and the vehicle would just stop as if it crashed into a wall and many more which for the sake of a kinda small review I will not mention) the RNG system of the game is unbelievably terrible from the spawn rate of cars to the airdrops (many times a crate will get stuck on top if unclimbable buildings or even in mid air) the terrain is terrible meaning at many points in a field you can crash while driving at imaginary little hills there is still no map selection the devs won't even pay attention to out feedback and will just keep "improving" the game in their own direction (which of course is to keep earning more money) hackers still reign this game after all these updates to eliminate them and last but not least more than enough times there is an inout lag between server and client resulting in slow response of in game actions from opening doors to picking up items. I would not buy this game again but I will sure be playing it some more as it's very fun when playing with friends (but nothing more than that unfortunately).

review: The game is very very VERY intense although slow paced. There is no hop in for a quick game (yet) some buckle for a ride that will last you a solid half hour of intensly scavinging for guns in schools and looting houses like never before. COD and other typical shooters have no thrill running and dying gets you a pic and the battle is have a high K/D. This feels like what a shooter should be. Punishing you for dying like you deserve (you WILL die ALOT no matter you Battlefield 1 K/D). Best parts inckude actually putting me on the edge of my seat lets be honest Titanfall 2's campiagn to a solid 4 hours of simply gameplay (and COD III even less) without the basic boringness of a campaign the game makes you learn through dying. Rage inducing but in the end actually helps those who do rage. It self prevents toxicity from drunk COD players and those normal people who want to play the game play the game. In solo you hide for your life in duo you and a friend can win with teamwork and in squad you get a random German guy in the NA server because he's stupid and your 4th friends mic is broken (mic is required for teamplay really). The game has already put itslef in Steams best with three modes 1 map and basic game requirements. With a zombie mode a fluid movement system and more coming expect to have lots of fun coming with more and more patches and updates. Buff pistols. Please.

review: Amazing game with many flaws. This game is really competetive so if you are not good at shooters just go play fortnite with the 12 year olds. The gameplay is amazing when it is working correctly. The loot system could be better as I am level 21 and i still have not received the skull mask when people that are level 2 get it. the loot system is useless as you grind for achivements only to get a striped shirt for a limited time. Other than that there are hacker but it is not as big of a problem as people make it out to be. I only see one hacker out of every 30 games i play if that people that claim hackers are usually people with bad enternet or computers or they are just bad at the game in general. Pub G does have a little bit of a desync problem as well. Even with these flaws I still recommend the game as it is my most played game and I believe this is nthe best br out there and it is a very fun shooter once you get the hang of it. If you are thinking about getting a good br game other than fortnite just get this one as no other br's and not too many shooters compare to this game.

review: The game is exciting and overall awesome. I can't speak more highly of the gameplay. I can't recommend this game right now because the cheaters are out of control and the anti cheat system they are using is not effective simply because the cheaters just buy the game again. With 100 players in each match you are absolutely going to have a dozen cheaters that just wreck the game. Every single match now. A couple months ago this wasn't the case. The cheating situation is continually getting worse not better. Do not send this company any more money until they take real action. They quote high ban numbers all the time as if that means anything but a large portion of the cheaters are in internet cafes in China and they just immediately rebuy the game. So in effect no cheaters are being banned. They need to IP ban all the cheaters including their public VPN's or ban hardware serial numbers. I suspect though since the cheaters just rebuy which generates more sales of the game the company is not to excited about actually fixing the problem that is wrecking this great game.

review: UPDATE 06/02/18 Frame Rate is better but nowhere near up to the standard it should be for a game this ugly.Still a broken mess. While driving our car wheel got stuck in the ground and nearly killed us. Also we were killed by a glitched grenade which deafened us with its broken physics sounds. Hit detection is a joke too. I'm not talking about the players i'm talking about the parts of the map. There's such a disconnect between where your bullets should be hitting and where they actually hit that it makes the game more frustrating than fun. 1.0 release Rubber banding. Non stop. EARLY ACCESS For a game that holds so much potential and promise the developers behind it are scummy and dont seem to be doing what's necessary to make this game actually good.It'll be far easier to go through the problems first and foremost as there are a tonne. OptimisationYes everyone talks about it that's why i'm putting it first. The optimisation in this game is STILL garbage. I hear people all the time responding to this criticism with "it's early access" and "it runs fine for me. First of all It may run fine for you but considering the sheer number of people complaining it must be a real issue! It can run fine for you doesn't mean it's well optimised!! Secondly in response to the "It's early access" argument.. Yes that would be fair however in the months it's been in early access improvements to the games optimisation have been miniscule. In addition the game is coming out of early access next month!!!PlayerUnknown himself said that optimisation will take months and lots of effort and yet the game is prepping for a 1.0 release in a matter of weeks implying that when this is out of early access it will still be unfinished! This is indefensible. They're releasing this game in an unfinished state with less content that star wars battlefront. BugsThe game is insanely broken. I've had friends forced to refund due to falling through the map i have found countless exploits vehicle physics are a complete disaster and so much more. Again does this seem fit for a full release??? GraphicsFor how shockingly bad this game runs the visuals are just atrocious. Blurry textures horrid animations terrible particle effects and so on. ContentFor 27 you get a single map lackluster customisation options and microtransactions. The developersThe developers can best be described as Incompetent greedy liars. They have promised things then gone back on their promises countless times ignoring complaints and causing even more issues with the game. Instead of fixing core problems with the game and remaining in early access they took the route that'll give them a bigger paycheck in that they are releasing an unfinished mess of a product as a full game (which they'll most likely charge even more money for).But enough railing on this game... Let's look at the positives!!!I guess it had the foundation of a good game buried in their somewhere...
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This is not game of the year material and does not deserve a steam award. With that being said when 1.0 came out the game became more optimized and hackers died out. The game runs smoothly on my pc and that can be the same for many others. Any negative reviews saying things like hackers are verywhere and the game is unoptimized should not be relevant at this moment. This game while quirky and annoying at some points can be a blast for you and your friends. If you feel like trolling them by taking a car and leaving them to die shooting them constantly or even taking all the loot and not giving it to them. However you can also be serious and employ tactics to obtain that ever elusive chicken dinner. If you are on the fence about this game don't be. It is fun tactical and an experience every casual shooter fan should have.

review: Not recommended mainly because 1. Very unoptimized game makes your frames drop even on low settings. The team is getting there optimizing it but the whole game probably would need a rework to get the maximum optimization.2. Laggy hitboxes will make you go "I LITERALLY SHOULD'VE SHOT HIM ALREADY"3. Incredibly boring mostly just looting and there's little to no combat anywhere and when there is it's usually ends up becoming problem 2.4. I know the developers are doing their best to get rid of hackers but this game is a hell even with 1 hacker. This isn't one of the games where you simply respawn and continue progress. This game's progression resets when you die/leave. Dying to a hacker is like quitting a game because it is.

review: Played three games so far that lasted roughly 20 minutes. Ran around a bunch and got shot through a smoke grenade. Apparently knew exactly where I was. Ran around a bunch and got sniped from the cliffs. Stayed in a house a bunch and a guy snaps his aim on me within a split second of me being visible in the window. Apparently everyone here is an aim god. This is the best running sim ever. Riding the dune buggy was cool. However if you even want a decent amount of excitement... This is not it.Update played more games. Thought maybe my experience was a fluke. Now I'm thinking people really like running sims. Maybe hobo hide and seek sim? Either way time wasted. Much regrets.

Jump into squad game and in time people will ask for your steam account and you will get new friends. So far i have not experienced any major glitches not even minor ones. I have only meet one hacker so far in 250 games so i don't see why people complain. Overall it's very fun game if you enjoy games as DayZ or arma III you will enjoy this )

review: Congrats Player Unknown you did it! You made a great game and then turned it into a pile of steaming hot diarrhea. When the game officially rolled out it wasvery exciting. It ran extremely smooth FPS was at an all time high and there was zero crashing. AND THEN YOU HAD TO GO AND F&amp %K WITH IT. Every single update you have come out with since the release has made the game more and more unplayable. I can't go more than three games without it crashing. Forget getting loot when you first drop. If you're lucky enough to not clip off of your intended target nothing will be loaded in and you will most likely get stuck in some book shelf that wasnt there 2 seconds ago. I know what you are thinking. "Maybe this guy just has a potato for a computer" aside from going out buying a Titan X every component of my computer is top of the line. Every single person that has taken part in the destruction of this game since its release need to pack their Your coders must have learned from a codeing for dummies book because every single time they go in to try and "fix" a non existant issue such as having people all over the map during the pre game lobby they up something vital to the game. Next update FIX YOUR F%$*ING GAME rather than adding some dumb a$$ decal for the buildings that advertise your Asian invitational that no one cares about. Simple solution for fixing it get rid of every single update you have come out and start over. We have given you plenty of money now give us a functioning game. Fortnite has created a working game in a fraction of the time. Its not hard. Also stairway railings might as well be a shield and when you break glass from shooting and it causes you to unscope is probably something you should work on.

review: Having spent an extensive amount of time playing this game I would have to recommend against purchasing it. Though the concept and premise of the game is incredible and entertaining the execution by the developers is poor. This game is fundamentally flawed and is very far from being a complete game. It should still be in pre release however the developers have shown time and time again that they are vastly more interested in generating a profit than they are with improving let alone meeting the standard of a finished game. This is apparent with their astonishing disconnect between the playerbase and their development team. As updates and patches come out you will often find yourself wondering if they even play their own game or if they update simply to create the illusion that they are actually trying to fix the numerous bugs and glitches this game has. Instead of implementing changes requested by fans such as map selection and regionlocking they decided to introduce a $2.50 aesthetic loot crate system. Thanks. Furthermore every server is plagued with individuals who are unable to effectively communicate or cooperate and will often team kill. Tie that in with outrageous ping and you have an unplayable and frankly frustrating experience. On top of all this the paramount issue that is encountered with striking frequency is that of hackers from over seas. Whether it be instant healing shooting through walls auto aim 600 meter triple headshots unlimited grenades it is now near impossible to play in any server without facing off against cheaters in the final 5 if you're lucky enough to have not been killed by one prior. And don't be confused there is no subjectivity on the matter of cheating the hackers are bold enough to be completely blatant with their cheating because they farm crates and used the money to purchase more game keys. Do not give this company your money. They do not care about their community unless they generate money for them and if that means sacrificing the experience for any legitimate player looking to kick back with some friends and have some fun then they will do so with a smile.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I'd just like to start off by saying the game is great. The amount of hours I have put into it is only rivaled by the likes of CSGO. The gameplay is fast and action packed. If you are able to get some friends to buy this game with you. Do it.Now comes my problem. I got home today excited to jump back into the action only to be greeted by "You have been permanently banned in PLAYERUNKOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS by the game's developer" I didn't quite know how to react so I looked to see if it was a possible mistake or maybe some negligence on my behalf. So I went through all my game files and other programs on my computer. After coming up empty I decided to look at my name and my profile to see if I had any offensive or derogatory content that might offend some people. Besides the vulgar comments left by my friends I could not find anything that could contribute to a permaban. So I submitted a ticket and decided to write this review. I will be more than happy to change the review to positive if this problem can be ironed out. I am even willing to change the review and remain positive as long as Bluehole and/or PlayerUnkown can give me a valid explanation for the permabanning with evidence. Until this however I am going to leave this review up. I wholeheartedly want this game to succeed over competitors like fortnite. But if this is how longtime players players who have actively supported the game since its alpha stages are being treated. Then I cannot find it within me to give this game a positive review.

review: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS (PUBG) is a very strategical game you can play with 1 3 of your friends. Loot spawns at locations and it varies due to the popularity and size of the location. At the start of the game you sit in a lobby with the toxicity of the other players. After a certain amount of time you will be put into a plane which has a random path over the island (Erangel). This is when you figure out where you want to go. Once you find the location you wait for the drop and proceed. When you land you need to find weapons as soon as possible. Check the zone and then if you need to leave it will be smart to find a vehicle. If you don't need to leave you can still find a vehicle but will have more time to loot. At least once during every zone there is an airdrop. These contain high tier loot such as M249's and Ghille Suits. Finding these will give you a very large advantage. While the zones are closing in you need to mind your flanks. Towards the very final zones you need to watch for grenades and people crawling up to you. In the final few you have a pretty good chance of survival. In this game the Chicken Dinner is everything. Get it and get clout. Without it you have no clout. Good luck out there!
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Awesome stuff aside there are some really frustrating things about this game.Since the new killcam system has been around you can actually see who killed you and how which helps with the frustration of being killed by a pistol assassin from 10 miles away which seems to be impossible. Another thing you might notice is the mind ing lag of the game. Many times looking at the killcam after being killed from around a corner you will see your killer landing shots with his/her recticle not even remotely close to where you are. I'm sure on the other player's screen you are within the recticle but it is frustrating as to constantly be killed when you are actually in cover but to another player you are still in the open.Like a said this little rant is one of the frustrating things in an otherwise awesome title.Will definitely recommend.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Its pretty fun. It does have some rubberbanding right when the match starts but it typically subsides. The new test branch of the game has major optimization improvements gained about 40fps or so. Ive never experienced any hackers before either. I'm pretty sure most of the negative reviews are from people who arent good or who dont have good internet or a powerful enough machine. I mean it IS early access after all you can't expect superb quality for how relatively new the game is. Honestly it does crash sometimes but not enough that its ruined my experience. Defnitely not perfect but still very fun and absolutely not as bad as some of these reviews seem

review: After 550 hours of a love hate relationship I have finally brought it upon myself to write a review. Gun balancingGun balancing has reached a point where I can actually consider it fair there are some guns that are made completely irrelevant by others like the Scar and M416 or the SKS and Mini 14 but overall the balancing with the ARs and Snipers is done well enough for a game like this. PerformanceTo PUBG's credit performance has actually improved by quite a bit since july of last year (when I started playing it). This of course isn't an exuse for the consistant frame drops in CQC and ADS when near an enemy. The CQC issue has existed since the beginning of this game's release and I have yet to see an actual effort to fix it it's truly painful to drop to 1fps for 3 seconds when you're at point blank of an enemy. Other than this the game will normally keep a consistant frame rate in mid and late game. The new war mode is pretty much unbearable because of extremely low frame rates due to having 100 players in such a small place but it's not yet part of the game so I won't knock them for it. Updates****ing hell do I wish the devs would listen to the community when it comes to adding more content. No one asked you to remove the last event mode. They keep adding new content for custom games which is a terrible decision IMO most custom games are run by twitch streamers that will give codes to their subs first and usually won't play what you want them to play. You shouldn't have to rely on someone else to play the content that blueballs adds. The new shotgun event mode is a step in the right deriction but they lack control over their own games it's clear that the event mode was thrown together in custom games and then ported into the menus as a game mode. All ammo types will spawn in shotguns only because apperantly the devs can't custom set items in their own game. Also we were promised a shooting range 9 months ago and we have yet to recieve one. Custom Games The next time I have to wait for Rahani Gupta to click start on a custom game lobby is when I unistall this game. Brendan Greene must have a daddy kink because he is basically every small PUBG custom game twich streamers . Custom games should have been released for everyone by now BlueBalls entertainment has confirmed that custom games DO NOT run on their own dedicated servers yet we still don't have public custom games. There are literally twitch streamers that survive by linking their streams in the title of a PUBG custom game making you sit through an entire ad to find out the code that probably won't even be there. Just flood the market by making custom games public drive these rats out of your game. This will only hurt those who take advantage of your game as twitch streamers will still be able to create custom games with passwords for their viewers. Final suggestionsPlease just pump out new stuff every week I don't care if you put in an unbalanced weapon it's still content that will bring me back into this game. Pushing out new content and tweaking based on testing will insure that your players will aprove of it when it's finished. I've probably left a lot of things out but this what I think is wrong with the game.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: TLDR One of the most overrated games in the history of video games. That being said this game is alot of fun with friends... sometimes. The game in its current state is riddled with hackers high ping players and crashes. Ups * Very satifying getting that chicken dinner despite all the hackers.* Lots of fun employing different strats every game because every game turns out different.* The pure joy of getting lvl 3 gear and a kar98k with an 8x.Downs * Hackers hackers and more hackers (majority are from Asia)* High ping players that can kill you 3 seconds after you get behind a wall* Suffers from regular D sync* Crashes when loading in and out of maps* PUBG has the graphics of a 2003 game yet runs awfully despite the "optimisation" * The progress with the game in terms of updates/patches is very slow.* No patch notes when theres 1GB+ updates like once a week.* Miramar has dirt loot Erangel has more hackers. Both maps are frustrating to play.I think this game would really prosper in the hands of a AAA company and I know they would kill to pick up this title after how big it has become. A proper developer would make this game great. Bluehole is too small it can't keep up with the work load and it desperately needs help from experienced devs.10/10 Would get headshotted by a full auto AKM from 1km away again.Region Lock China
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Being in alpha this game has quite a few bugs and performance issues (needs more optimization) but these things aside the game is so much fun. Few games will get your heart pounding like this one will. Being in the last 3 survivors in a tiny are in the woods waiting for any sign of movement is intense and the excitement of winning is addicting as hell. RNG can sometimes feel a little unfair but to be honest even though you'll have matches that get you salty getting out and back into a match is so fast its not a big deal when you lose. Game is 10x better with friends too! 8/10 as is mostly because of bugs and crashes that im confident will be fixed by the time the game is released in its entirety.

review: All I can say is that I thought I would enjoy this game more. My friends hyped it up when I was building my computer for the longest time. It did not deliver for me. This game takes an incredible amount of skill to master. I am not great at the game but at the same time the game felt like work rather than having fun just playing a game. It is high risk high reward kind of game that is taken very seriously because there are no respawns or do overs. You died while looking for the best guns there goes 30 minutes and you accomplished nothing. Don't get me wrong there are intense action packed moments that do put a smile on your face but I found myself gritting my teeth while waiting for those shining moments.

review: 7/10 TLDR It's fun with a few friends but it gets annoying because network lag clunky controls and involves a lot of luck (drops circle when you are a certain place). You can get to end game without looting or moving. Basically... Drop out of plane. Run to nearest weapon. Kill. Survive. Loot. Kill till you are the last alive. Plane path is random Loot is random who lands near you *basically random. A lot of "randomness" in this game and its frustrating when you dont need a lot of skill to win. The Juicy bits... You feel adrenaline near end game but as you play more and more you dont feel the adrenaline anymore. Killing people is satisfying especially when you snipe them from far away with a silenced 1911 (jk I didnt do that but it would have been cool if i did) Controls The controls feel clunky in the beginning (especially jumping) but you get used to it. Learn to crouch jump trust me it helps out so much. Especially when you are at school because you can jump in and out of windows that people wont expect you to come out of. The more you play the better you get with controlling the character and guns. Vaulting over walls is VERY slow. If you can crouch jump as vaulting leaves you very vulnerable to other players.Overal... After the new update everything is smoother but the vaulting is slow.Pros Killing is always very satisfying in this game Large map and each game is a bit different every timeCons Still unoptimized in some areas of the maps (though its gotten a lot better)
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: PUBG is an uninteresting waste of time. The fun part of the game aka the shooty shooty part is so few and far apart. You can either start aggressively and land in a high loot area like the various cities to get some gun fights but this will normally result in a loss because even if you do kill every person in the time it took you will be to far from the circle to survive. The shooty part also comes at the end but it is mostly sniping behind trees. Between the start and finish of a game you have a 15 20 minute period of just running and finding the same you already have with a gun fight once in a blue moon. On top of very very boring gameplay the game runs like hot and even on high settings it still looks ugly.

review: OK I love this game I really do. I will not however give this game a "thumb up" while the devs ignore the steam forums. In addition to this I had never encountered a hacker in this game up until a couple weeks ago..then all of a sudden a massive influx of cheaters for some "UNKNOWN" reason.If Bluehole wants to kill this game quicker than just about anything else keep allowing these cheaters to do what they are doing.I paid to play a game so I could enjoy it not be harassed by hackers and cheats. The community on the steam forums are ignored where are the moderators to lock all of the bogus postings?Get with it Bluehole.http //steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id 1182958212EDIT DEC. 2017 The devs have made some progress as far as the blatant cheating in game which is good. I do not notice nearly as many problems as before. As a result I am going to change my review to "recommend" for now. Hopefully they will keep up the good work and be proactive in keeping the game as cheater free as possible.

review: Player Unknows Battlegrounds is a very fun game! the controls are easy to handle and the mechanics are easily learnd in a few games. I have made a small list of pros and cons to the game belowPros Immersive and realistic A well developed game (so far please note the game is still being worked on) A very avtive development team constantly releasing information and updates to the game Nice graphics! (even on the lower settings)Cons some may find the $30 pricetag to high for an early access game ( i do understand that the game is still being developed ) if you do not have a very powerfull computer it may be hard to run It can be very frustrating at times e.g. you can be in a game for 20 minutes then just get shot in the head (keep in mind that this is of no fualt of the devs)Overall i really enjoy this game if you are willing to spend the 30$ nad have someone to play it with i would absolutely reccomend it )

review: Judging by my hours in the game you can tell that i have been a fan of this game since its release. I played this game about everyday i came home from work knowing it was in early accsess and wanting to test for new bugs and what not and report these things because this game has MASSIVE potential. However recently the game has completely phased out of early access and has transfered over to a complete show. The game in its current state i cannot recommend AT ALL. In the games current state there are so many things that are wrong with the game at this point it feels like they're trying to hide it. They're simply showing new development on maps anti cheat measures etc keep in mind this is after they said their new "cheatbuster" was banning 6k hackers a day. The moment that post came out from the company almost every single game i got into had atleast 1 2 hackers. To put a long story short and sum this game up in a nutshell as of now the game is entirely run by de sync servers no region locking and last but not least hackers. Like i said earlier the game has MASSIVE potential but it seems to be is being completely neglected just for money and not for the community.

review: This game had the potential to be so good but was ruined by the developers. Currently the game has been plagued by hacking for months especially in Third Person modes. None of their anti cheat updates have shut down large scale hacking yet. On top of current issues they have backed on promises and had a lot of other problems that continue to degrade the quality of this game. Modding was promised with version 1.0 which still has not released. A 4x4 map was promised to be the second map released with faster gameplay as requested by users. Instead we got Miramar an even slower 8x8 that also had very bad optimization issues. Microtransactions were promised not to be released until 1.0 arrived. 3 months later they backed on this and started selling crates + keys. The xbox release was a joke and not even close to ready for a public release. To capitalize on hype they released anyways.This game is amazingly fun when it works and is hack free but since alpha release there has always been major problems that prevent this game from being the best it could be. The developers are excessively greedy for cash and will burn their playerbase for an extra buck.5/10 would drop another 700 hours in game.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game is honestly one of the best BRs I have ever played... at times. I have put up with so much with this game convinced so many friends to buy it and play it with me when it first came out and I had so much fun even with horrible frame rate and desync. It was fun. Because everyone was lagging it wasnt that big of a deal it put you on an even playing field.Ever since a few month prerelease this game has just became horrible for me. I have have put so many hours in trying to get better and play more stategic and it means absoulutely nothing. Every time I get down to the final 10 I am guaranteed to have to fight a hacker it feels like. Which is horrible. The only way to win is when they are aimbotting someone else k9 headshot them. It isn't fun. I have to play completely different to try and outplay these kids that are garbage. It is even worse on other servers besides NA. Every game in asia and kr has a hacker. Every other game NA. Its horrible. I can only manage to play a few games until I get tilted and have to just play something else. I may just quit all together until a better anti cheat is released.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Overall it's pathetic. How long does it take to patch obvious errors? How long does it take to take action against cheaters? Looking at the top 10 in every region that all have 50 hours+ per season and are obviously hacking should tell you everything you need to know about the the quailty of the pubg devolpment team and their lack of desire and capability to react with any sense of urgency. One would think that being the most popular game on the internet for a year would have increased the frequency and quality of their devolpment. You're wrong. Instead of taking the money earned from this game during its beta and reinvesting it they took the money to make a new company and are already starting devolpemnt of a new game Ascent instead of finishing this one. The game has sold an astonishing 20 million copies....and it's still unfinished. Unexcusable and pathetic and in my opinion is borderline criminal. This is a cash grab by the devolpers same as with Day Z that will be in "devolpment" for the next 4 years and will never come out of beta. They slapped a 1.0 label on it but don't let it fool you. This game is the exact same quailty as it was in beta. They added a new map for the same crap product and called it 1.0....slow clap. With all the money they could ask for this is the best that they can do. Can't reiterate pathetic enough.TL DR Don't waste yout time. Play a game that's actually released by a competent development team.

review: Look I understand I'm not the best player but this is ridiculous. Before this starts here are my computer specs Nvidia geforce 960m 16 gigs of ram i7 intel processor my internet connection clocks in stable at 10 20 ping over 100 mbps download over 25 mbps download. When I first started playing this game maybe 5 months ago it was addicting. It seemed rather balanced and it was a rush. Especially with friends. I came back to it after not playing it for weeks. Expected the same amount of fun. I was DEAD WRONG. I have never posted a bad review before but this game will be the first. The hackers are out of control. Out of the last 8 games I've played between now and writing this review NOT ONCE WAS I NOT KILLED BY SOMEONE WHO WASN'T HACKING. Not once. Hackers arent even the main problems. This game LAGS. Shots at long distances are almost impossible. Short distances are choppy at best. The only time you can get a kill is if you within 20 meters and the opponent has not seen you and uve got a clear shot. Which happens almost never. I have logged over 60 hours into this game and have yet to win a game with over 150 matches. The loot boxes give you multiples of the same items. I have two of the same shirt....I mean comeon. Why even give me a crate? And all of these complaints are only viable if you can connect to the servers without them being "full". I admit I'm not the best at this game there are certainly people better than me. Before this degregation I would average every 2 3 games I would make it in the top 10. Now I cant even make it 30 players in before I'm killed by a hacker no scoping me at a kilometer. This game has a great concept. Its too bad that its unplayable for people like me who dont care if they win or lose the game. They just want a fighting chance.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I see a lot of potential in this game to be honest I let it sit around in my library for quite some time mostly due how low my frames would get even on low graphics but when I tried the new test server i was able to run at 60 fps on ultra graphics only ocasionally dropping to 55 fps their where some issues with rubber banding in the first minute after jumping but all in all the game feels MUCH more enjoyable than when I first got it in august I have faith this game will only get better with time I think the devs are really tryingP.S. to the people giving negative reviews and saying they uninistalled because they cant get in the second the game goes live due to server issues grow up XD*update I've noticed in 90% of my deathcams the person killing me is firing 10 feet away from my body not sure if it's the deathcam thats broken or netcode is just that ed up if its the first option please fix deathcam so I can actually get a good idea whether or not someone is hacking if its the latter. fix the netcode i dont need to stress being shot 10 feet from your body and getting killed is stupid all in all still enjoy game though. keep trying to polish this baby devs! this game deserves a better rep (and less racists in proxy chat)

review: Pros If you like Miscreated Squad Rust ARMA Search and Destroy (Call of Duty) or any game like that then this is the game you've been waiting for. It uses Battle eye for anti cheat. Also unreal engine is used in this game. It's very team based and communication is 100% key to victory. The gameplay including vehicles is very smooth for an early access game which is very promising. So future optimization will only make it better. The game is a nice mix between firefights and being stealthy/ sneaky &amp camping. The way the game is designed prevents people from hard camping which is great. There's no leveling system for your character or attribute points which makes the game 100% SKILL BASED. Game physics is really niceCons Character customization is very limited limited amount of guns (for now many more sure to come) limited armor options (for now more might come)The game has many updates coming into the near future such as being able to climb as well as vaulting walls vehicles and even through a window! Also there will be many more maps as well as different weather! Definitely check out this game don't be surprised if it hits the competitive scene hard as the new main go to game.I will edit my review later to include a nice detailed played in game scenario.

PUBG is a great game with a not so great chinese community. They join non asian servers in mass. To the point where I can't even que NA or OCE (the two farthest servers from eachother) without getting minimum 2 Chinese players and the entire feed is 90% chinese players. This in its own right is an issue not because of their race country of origin etc. But rather because of the way the game handles lag/delay. It BENEFITS the lagger/delayer.Then there is the fact that if you que into 3 chinese friends they will most likely team kill you. review: I really enjoyed playing this game with my friends. I have had this game since the beginning of June 2017 and it was fun real fun..up until the Official release that is. There was some hacking starting to show just before the release but after the day of release it was as if the flood gates were opened. I do not reccomend this game anymore. Had you asked me 2 3 months ago I would have reccomended this game in a heartbeat. Pro's Can be really fun and a teambuilder. Different game for each match you play. Decent variety of weapons to choose from to mold and hone your skills with. Test Server (great to try out a new update before it hits the official servers).Con's Hacking. inconsideration for the community (Community makes a statement on an issue and is given a vage answer). Rubberbanding. Hit boxe registers. Reporting system (Developers intend for the playerbase to police the streets of PUBG) Crates (Content is great but not content the community in unison says "We do not want/care for crates". Game crash and no optimization updates on a regular basis.I may have only 225 Hours of gameplay many others have thousands and will disagree with my review. I and 6 others who play this game will vouch on every reason I do not reccomend this game. Please listen to the community work with them and work towards a future in which this game does not have its playerbase die.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Product received for free. I only go into this game to meme with dank songs. Otherwise I don't bother playing this game.This game is legit garbage. It was fun for a while but it went into the garbage can quickly. Most servers are filled with people from the asian region with their garbage rubberbanding and this isn't even including the hackers from the region. It's disappointing when you get a few kills into the game and then have a random asian hacker fire 500 yards away and kills you with their aimbotting program. Just a major disappointment compared to the numerous other Battle Royale games. (Even H1Z1 has a better anti cheat detection service and they've been desperately reworking their game.)I rather play Fortnite or H1Z1 over this garbage. Fortnite offers events to keep the game exciting and bans hackers often. H1Z1 went free to play and deseprately reworking the game especially keeping hackers out of their game. (For a free to play game a hacker can easily remake an account but they don't last long in the new system.) If you want developers who actually care about the health of their game and not focused on doing a cash grab from their customers avoid this game entirely. This game is completely overhyped and I'm glad my friend bought this game than myself.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: If you like playing an unstable peices of garbage filled with terrible netcode awful lag zero optimization and cheaters everywhere then this is the game for you! Spend minutes upon minutes searching around aimlessly for loot and weapons only to die. Also don't bother getting too used to the game's mechanics or systems because they change. All. The. Time. They're called "updates" or "bug fixes". Keep in mind everything on this game is probably more inconsistent than anything you have ever seen in your life.Am I frustrated? Do I SEEM frustrated. I think I have a right to be. I did after all be the idiot who paid thirty damn dollars expecting at most a quality peice of work or something at least decent (it's neither).For anyone reading this I highy recommend you. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!I haven't played Fortnite YET but I am going to because it is FREE and it is actually STABLE!

review: This is a pretty amazing game for this genre. It is familiar and totally fresh at the same time hard to remember when an fps game made me feel that way. Hunger games for PC is easiest reference if you have no idea what this game is. 100 players go onto island play area gets smaller and smaller. Last man standing wins. A lot of the game is about the tension and having no idea if someone is about to blow your head off. The rest of the game is often about not firing your guns and simply staying still lying down on the ground as enemies walk right past you and you feel your heart beat. It took me a little while to really get into it (you just die a lot early as there is no tutorial). Once you push through the early learning phases what lies underneat is fun exciting calming and has a great pace to the games. Suprised me with how fun it got once I was a few hours into playing. Every match begins with jumping out of airplane which is my favorite part of the game as you all race to objectives sometimes you get the gun and blow their head off sometimes they get it. Worth every penny.

review: The reason why i wouldnt recommand you buy this get RIGHT NOW is because of the many issues i will give but it doesnt mean the game isnt fun its just unplayable at this current state so come back in a few months and i would recommend the game.Without further ado here are my few reasons why i would recommend buying this game as of yet.1 When play for the first few secounds of the match it laggy as HELL even with me having good internet i bandwith hard in the first few minutes of the game to the point sometimes i lag out of the game. Its as if the game's servers cant handle 100 people.2 Middle game (when there is 40 30 people left) is so borring with most of the time you running around place to place just to find no one then get instantly headshoted from 100 meters away from some camping in a house.3 The map is to big since there are times where you wont find people for 5 10 minutes even when you running around trying to find people (this mostly happens with my friends in sqaud/duo) with us running around the area where 20+ people landed to find no one. This is also extremely dumb during mid game as its just a game of you cant kill the last guy not who can kill the most people4 The amount of bugs and glitchs in this game are insane with veiclhes flying across the map from the smallest ramps and when you run into a motorcycle (with a bigger veichle) it will get stuck inside instendly killing you and you're squad.5 The amount of hackers in this game from only play 17 hours i have found 10+ (to my believe) aimbotting and wallhacking. Its only going to get worse as if they dont fix the anti cheat system it could become like csgo with everyone cheating agianst the other team who is also cheating.

review: What can I say about PUBG?Player Unknowns Battle Ground offers very fun experiences for youself and friends i've made countless memories from short hearted defeats victorious wins and even stupid deaths. PUBG is smooth and it runs very well I can Twitch stream 60fps video and still get solid 120fps in game with a AMD R9 200 although I recommend it for someone who can atleast handle 2k 4k games so that you can have a high fps game. Gameplay is good i've met some good people had some good times but it needs some updates. Make a bigger impact between the Vertical Grip and Horizontal Grip because there is no use for the Horizontal. Also make the flash hider an actual flash hider since its not even hidden. PUBG is probably the best game I own other than (league hehe) and I wont be quitting it anytime soon I see a lot of good things the developers can make (possibly a snow map or a map with dynamics ). review: Let me start by saying that I do thoroughly enjoy this game and if you're into open arena type games this game is sure to catch your attention. Everything I say is to try to give a completely unbiased opinion to allow outside users to get a feel for what they're getting into.Now... Let me tell you why I absolutely want to break my screen in half over this game. PUBG (PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS) as of right now is unbelievably unoptimized graphically among other things. The balance of the game is absolutely ridiculous when it comes to fairness. I understand that it's a game so it's not going to be realisitc but when someone has a double barrel shotgun with a choke on it can one shot headshot me from down the block after I tagged them with 4 rounds to the chest and they don't even flinch I don't much think that's very fair. Apart from even that imense BS grenades other then the HE grenade is next to useless. Smokes are rarely used and even when they are you don't know which direction the "wind" will take it possibly not even providing you with cover to move. Stun grenades are almost non existance in terms of actual play. Graphically speaking the game has major issues with maintaining a constant framerate even in non dense quiet areas meaning no explosions or a bunch of fog or smoke or rain is going on. Server lag isn't a big issue compared to the other problems with the game but at the start where I notice most server lag if you land somewhere with a lot of people and have to quickly grab a gun and fight there's too much delay which could give your opponent a leg up. The sound is way too muffled and faded out and can't usually be made out too well unless it's quiet in the surrounding area. The point system is very unforgiving and can get very frustering.Now that's all said and done I do understand that the game is still undergoing mass changes a lot of updates and fixes which is just ONE reason why I love this game. This game brings so much fun and enjoyment it's hard to step away most of the time. Playing with friends doesn't punish you for goofing around the game itself doesn't limit you on what you can or can't do (Aside from the TOS of course) and it can really make for a lot of good times and goofy moments. If the developers continue on the path they are fixing bugs updating and reworking tweaking just the right way... This game has a very VERY bright future. With all memes aside this game has a long ways to go before it's eSports ready but when it truly is I'm sure it'll be great. MuFFiN
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Short version As far as gameplay and concept go this game is pretty spot on. It blends excellent gunplay simple yet effective looting mechanics and a beautiful well designed environment to create a heart pounding tactical chess match. While there are still plenty of problems even in the current state it s a great experience. Pros Emphasis on tactics positioning and careful movement without sacrificing good gunplay. Balanced and fun weapons. Risk vs Reward implemented well. Easy to get into games. The game looks great. (I ve been playing on ultra) Very immersive Map size and design. Good level of randomization mixed with the choices of 90ish other players make the game very replayable. Paced well. A full game down to the last player ends up being like 25 minutes. I honestly don t normally make it longer than like 10 15. ctrl t Devs communication. Cons Poorly optimized at the moment. If you re not on a good rig I d wait. Vehicle mechanics are a little wonky. Some weird stuff happens. Occasional bugs. I ve only experienced 1 or 2 that really negatively affected playability. It s not finished ? Addressing some of the concerns that I've seen pop up in other reviews From a technical side there are some issues most of the negative reviews I've read have mentioned poor optimization and server issues and those are definitely something to consider before picking this game up. I'm running it on a pretty high end rig and there are definitely times when the framerate tanks. That being said I've never had it drop below 30fps which I'd still consider playable. As far as server issues I've almost never had any lag or slow downs but maybe I'm just lucky. I also see a lot a people talking about cheaters but can't say that I've ever come across any (yet). It doesn't seem to be plagued with them which was something I was worried about before getting into the game.The vehicle mechanics are pretty bad but I ve also seen worse in finished games. I m excited to see where the devs go with them. The sound is another thing I ve seen talked about a lot. I personally really like the way it s set up and the effects themselves are wonderful. It is very hard to identify where shots are coming from when you re being shot at no denying that but I personally love what it does to the immersion and keeps the game more focused on tactical maneuvering and strategy than strictly gunplay. Anyways I hope this is helpful for those interested. I ve really enjoyed this game and am very excited to see it progress and hopefully improve on it s very promising frame.

review: Although this is probably one of the best king of the hill games in terms of its gameplay I can't even come close to recommending it due to its severe development problems. Lag is always present whether you have a good connection or not I often find myself trying just to get to the lobby because it keeps telling me that the server is busy (well put me in a queue genius) or it timing out before I conect to my duo / squadd game effectively banning me from the game in progress and seperating me from my team. The game also regularly crashes especially as soon as I join a game. Doors are buggy bikes are buggy and if you're not concentrating almost impossible to control. They will also do about 50 backflips before exploding and killing you after they touch a pebble. Being in a vehicle with someone else driving is buggy. Being in the back of a bike while the driver leaves the car is buggy. Getting weapons at the start of the game is buggy I'll pick up a shotgun right next to a guy who just got his m16 except either it doesn't show the shotgun in my hotbar or it won't let me reload for a while effectively condemning me to a ridiculous death. Swimming is also buggy but it's more of an animation glitch rather than anything annoying. Hitboxes on objects are I've hit the fence in front of me or the half meter of air above a rock instead of someones head countless times. While grenades have a bow trajectory it may aswell just be an arrow pointing in the direction of where you are throwing because it rarely throws the grenade in the given trajectory. The servers are also down very often.To summarize unless you plan on playing with friends or have extremely high tolerance for broken games I wouldn't reccomendd this game.

Before you think oh this man is just salty cause he was outgunned yes I was outgunned and also (thanks to the wonderful implementatin of deathcam) I can see that I was also out teleported and out shot across map by a guy with a red dot sight on an UMP.Thanks for ruining your already bad game.Teleports behind you nothing personal kid just hacking Games full of bugs but thats expected for an Early Ac wait They released it full? So the bugs are all gone right? no? well of course there are bound to be a few non major bugs but all the big ones are gone right? like you can shoot both ways through chain link fences and buildings render as soon as you see them if your computer exceeds the minimum requirements? What do you mean No? But seriously Exceed requirements buildings dont load in or look like a 5 year olds crayon drawings settings all on very low. Think its just my crappy computer? maybe but it beats the minimum reqs How about when you play this game on a beast machine that costs 3 grand and is running that sexy GTX 1080Ti . Well then you get to play on medium settings. TLDR I don't think a computer exists that can play this game at high to max settings. and hackers.

review: you're looking for a game review you've come to the wrong place. But if youre looking for a fantastic ravioli recipe you've come to the right place.Ingredients To Make the Dough375 grams (3 cups) plain flour1/2 teaspoon salt2 eggs1/4 cup (50 ml / 3½ tablespoons) olive oil1/2 cup (120 ml / 8 tablespoons) waterExtra flour for dusting To Make Cheese Filling15 ounces (425 grams) container Ricotta cheese5 ounces (142 g/about 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons) "3 Cheese Italian Blend" (Parmesan Romano &amp Asiago)Note grate these cheeses yourself and create your own custom blend.1/2 cup cheddar cheese2 eggs lightly beaten1/2 teaspoon salt1/2 teaspoon pepper ExtrasYour favorite sauce for the ravioli (i.e. marinara/ marijuana)Parmesan cheeseBasilFried vegetablesShrimpFish slicesChicken pieces Make the Ravioli filling. In a small mixing bowl add the ricotta and mash with a fork. Add in the 3 cheese blend Cheddar cheese eggs salt and pepper. Mix all ingredients thoroughly until you have a smooth paste like consistency. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and place it in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes. Make the Ravioli dough. Crack eggs into a large mixing bowl and beat them with a fork. Add water oil and salt. Mix. Add 1 cup flour to the bowl. Use a fork to mix the flour with the eggs water oil and salt. Repeat with the rest of the flour. Mix until a smooth dough is formed. Clear and clean off a large work surface and dust it with flour. This is where you are going to roll out your dough. Take the dough out of the mixing bowl shape it into a ball and place it on your work surface. Knead for at least 10 minutes or until it becomes elastic. Dust a rolling pin with flour to prevent the dough from sticking. Roll out the dough until it is about 1/8 inch (1/3 cm) thick or about the thickness of 2 stacked quarters. With a cookie cutter or upside down water glass cut out circles in the dough (will make about 15 20 dough circles). Ball up the unused dough and either roll it out and make a couple more raviolis or wrap it and put in the freezer for another time. Dough can keep for weeks when frozen. Just make sure to wrap well so that it doesn t suffer from freezer burn or absorb freezer odor. Fill the Ravioli shells. Take the ravioli filling out of the refrigerator and place a tablespoon of it in middle of a dough. Fill a small bowl with water dip your fingers in and moisten around the outer edge of the dough circle. Fold the dough in half over the filling making a half moon shape. Be sure all the filling stays inside. Pinch the edges together and then seal the edges of the ravioli with a fork. Make sure to press firmly and go all the way around. This will add a homemade touch as well. Repeat this process for all your dough circles. Dust the finished ravioli with flour to keep them from sticking together. Form the Shells and Fill Using a Ravioli maker. Roll the dough into two sheets Place one sheet on the ravioli maker and form the filling cups. Fill with the ravioli mixture. Lay the second sheet of dough on top and roll it out. This will seal in the filling. Remove and separate the finished raviolis.Cook the Ravioli. Fill a large pot with water and bring to a boil. Place the ravioli in boiling water for 5 6 minutes or until they float. You can also test for doneness by nibbling on the edges to test. If you don't want to make all the ravioli at one time you can freeze the rest Take ravioli out of boiling water with large slotted spoon and place on warmed platesServe it up.Top with your favorite sauce grate some fresh cheese over it and enjoy!

review: This game is amazing. been playing it since march and i love the game play and machanics behind it. The thing that i feel would make this better is the latency and tick rates in the servers. Many times i would be behind and object during a fight and somehow i would get a late hit being rejestered. Another thing would be while the RGN aspect is great when it comes to weapons the vehicle spawns are something of a challenge. When the zone is starting to move i spend forever trying to find a vehicle wo make it in but fail to While other times i find 5 right next to each other. So it will feel like to find a vehicle you need to have a vehicle. The last thing is when i comes to shotguns in particular. The shots with a shotgun is the most frustrating thing to me. Close range it should be the most feared and deadly weapon PERIOD! But a lot of the time when i use it close range i have to hit the opponent 3 4 time before they go down and many times i get hit once from a distance and get 1 shotted. Its an incredibly frustrating thing to deal with even if i put a choke on the gun. Other then that this is a fantastic game to play and recommend it with any of my friends.

review: A great game trapped inside a mediocre game.The idea behind the game and the base mechanics are quite fun and this game is great with 1 3 friends.However there are definitely some issues with the game namely (Objective issues) Hackers/cheaters Bugginess (I might never load into the game at all I might get stuck on something in game etc.) Still needs optimization work(Subjective issues) Loot dispersion Game timing Fast paced at the beginning then walking/driving for 10 minutes then fast paced at the end. While this occurs across the board in the BR genre I think it is exacerbated in PUBG. A new 4x4 km map could certainly remedy this situation and is in development.It gets a lot right but it still needs a lot of fixing.I'd still recommend buying it since it's a really fun BR game (and I prefer its style over the cartoonish trampoline shotgun simulator that is Fortnite).

review: To start off with this game was a lot of fun to play and enjoy with friends. Though the game had and still has many many bugs and lag issues I still had fun with it. The running around and looking for guns and hoping to make it was enthralling choosing to be sneaky or go full comando or even stay back and snipe was insanely fun and the fact that you can kinda choose what kind of person you're going to play. There were a lot of things that also made the game still feel like it's still in beta as well and I do believe that this game was nowhere near fuill release ready. The loot boxes were and still are a horrible idea and you get them on random so when you get the desperado crate you need to buy a key with actual money to open it and you can't get rid of them if you aren't going to buy the key. Though the biggest issue besides the loot crates and bugs are the sheer giant amount of hackers/ cheaters/ people with clearly band internet connection in this game. Those with high ping and those that hack and cheat are fully destorying any kind of fun that this game use to have. Being shot by a dead person or shot around a wall because of their high ping or just being shot through the wall or even being shot by a shot gun while being on the other side of the map completely ruins any enjoyment in this game. It completely destroys any kind of balance for this type of game where reaction will be who generally will win. And when you cheaters and high ping are completely ruining the game's balance then something should be done. It's even on record that 99% of cheaters come from China and many people are asking to be region locked. Hence why a lot of people say region lock china. But in the end Brendan Greene Mr PlayerUknown himself (the creator of the game) has basically told everyone that we are nothing but racist people for asking for the region lock. For asking that the game's balance be intact and that let skill win you the prize. And it's an major issue that needs to be fixed. But let's also think about when you go and play with squads or duo how would you be able to play with a partner who doesn't speak your language ? How can you help them? How can they tell you where the enemy is coming from? Do they need health items? Do they need ammo? What kind? And there's no body language to look at so are completely up in the air in trying to figure out. And this can frustrate any player in any region where someone else from another country is trying to talk to them or you. I would love for this game to be balanced and be fair for everyone no matter where you're from but when that experience is being ruined and the creator clearly doesn't care then it's hard to care for a game where you're told you are the racist or wanting things fixed and balanced. Would I recommned this game? No not at all. Until the creator and the developer understand what a balanced and fair shooter is suppose to be and clearly stops calling everyone who disagrees with him a racist then go for it. Till then go to Fortnite or wait for the many other games that are now going to be doing battle royal in a much more fair and balanced way.

review: As it stands this is a decent game. I can't currently recommend as even after it "1.0" release it is still plagued with problems. Random crashes mid match that if you are moving while you crash when restarting you continue to run forward several times I have had to restart only to come back to of run into the fog and have to turn around and run back due to a crash taking needless damage. To further annoy me upon relaunching I am unable to aim forcing me to hip shot constantly until the end of the match. Audio is bugged more times than I can count a player will drop off something and I will hear the landing sound in one ear turn to face that direction then get shot in the back this happens randomly I have yet to figure out if there is a specific set up that causes it. Same thing happens with gun shots the over all report in this is semi accurate by semi you will hear the "pop" than the bang. Most games that actually use this system have a pop followed by a bang the bang telling you where the shooter is. In this it's still the same concept except instead the bullet whizzing by you is a bang and the report is a pop. While the bang pop sounds being swapped is not a big deal the the sound coming in random ears is. If I had my guess it's almost as if it is based on the direction you are facing when they fire. So if they are to your right and they fire we'll say they miss and the pop is behind you and you turn around before the report. The report will still come through the right ear instead of the left at this point you will turn right putting your back toward the shooter and start scanning the horizon for them while being shot at from behind. While you will figure it out pretty quickly the fact this is a game about spotting before being spotted this is a huge problem. This one is a tad more rare but a couple of times I have jumped off the plane had no parachute and slammed into the ground. While it has not killed me I remain the rest of the match unable to turn use weapons or aim. As I am stuck in the free falling animation. I am not going to cover the not region locked servers as there are plenty of reviews on that and I'm not going to rehash that complaint as it's already been covered. I will just say it is a problem. A "Cheat" you can do is to turn your graphics down which will remove or lessen some surrounding grass and make players easier to spot. This should be addressed somehow. A game having bullet drop mechanics and travel time there should be a way to practice on a shooting range where you can take your time. The closest thing I have seen to being able to do this is jump through hoops to set up a private server then get a couple of friends to join you with the intent of not actually trying to win the match but to learn the weapons while still dealing with the wall. At the time of writing this review I have Steam telling me I have 15 hours in the game and these are all problems I have found in that short time. The game is fun and is a good way to waste some time if you have friends to play with it's where the game really shines but until the issues are fixed I personally can't recommend the frustration of that feeling of being bowled over by game mechanics instead of being wrecked by another player's skill is infuriating. As a side note if you do get this game. Avoid trying to melee if at all possible. The hit box for melee is all wonky. TLDR The game is plagued with bugs and issues from audio to game play mechanics server are not regionlocked and the anti hack / anti cheat is extremely weak. The game is fun but has some issues that need to be worked you to go from being decent to actually good.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him "If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate you have to stop immediately.' Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exactly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung concer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me "Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through." I agreed. At slight sense of regret for never having done it because this game gave me cancer anyway.

review: Insanely fun to play with friends but lately all matches are filled with cheaters and the developers apparently care more about SJW t than securing their game. Last match had players not only spraying headshots with norecoil m249 across the map but also others literally proning at car speed. Wonder how are they still unable to instaban something so absurdely obvious. Performance is getting better and better but matches are unplayable with so many cheaters. Cannot recomend the game in its current state.17/02/2018 Game is STILL filled with cheaters after their "security enforcement" patch. Content is frozen except for DLC loot boxes. The more I play the more I realize how poorly made this game is. DO NOT BUY and don't expect improvement. As a side note I find outrageous that the game lobby consumes 100% of CPU and GPU renderizing only player models and grass.

review: I only play this game now as a reason to cry knowing full well that after a year into its release there has been no fix for hacking lag makes this game less fun than lighting yourself on fire and winning just means that a hacker either DC'd or decided your existence wasn't worth their effort.As someone who suffers with severe depression If there was a game where you take a toaster into a bath I would give it a better rating than PUBG.My favorite part of this game is people blowing into their mic in the lobby white kids telling other kids to pick their cotton ( a lot of farmers play this game) and dying from trying to land on a roof because it gives me the satisfaction of knowing that I killed mysaelf and not a 14 year old Chinese kid with a learning disability who uses cheat engine.If you are looking for any sort of reason to end your life this game will surely help you find the motivation to accomplish your life long dream.

review: 208 hours put into the game and am consistantly in the top 3000.My first BR game and I have to say that I am in love with it. If you like shooting games with a sense of strategy involved and are tired of repetitive small map shooters. Fun to play and watch on Twitch. Great with friends fun solo. Very rewarding feeling when you do well(winner winner chicken dinner!) and it's very easy to tell if you are improving. Game is still in early access and still needs some tuning but the devs are always hard at work and are constantly updating and listening to the community! Don't listen to the people whinning and giving the game a bad review because they got banned for cheating/harassing other players. They stream snipe Twitch streamers to kill them and/or harass them in an attempt to ruin the stream and have their 15 seconds of fame. Once these trolls are all delt with the community will be better!I recommend watching Athony_Kongphan and Grimmmz on Twitch if you are looking to get better at the game. Good luck and have fun!

review: I just want to put a positive review on here because yes this game has it flaws its buggy and its performance isnt the best. Buuuut basically everyone putting bad reviews on this game has at least a minimum of 100 hours or more. So you all obvisouly enjoyed the game enough to put a few days of your life into this game. I absolutely love it and ive met some awesome people playing this as well. Ive had problems with loading into the game stupid glitches whle landing and guns not work when i clearly had better postioning. But PlayerUnknown has said on Twitter that they have version 1.0 done theyre just working out the bugs and kinks. So this will be a full release im assuming by the end of this year or early next year. Which is waaaaaaay more progress than DayZ has seen. So i think everyone just needs to quit whinning and enjoy the game for what it is.

review: Its still early access and just had the release date postponed.. The biggest problem with this game is the rampant cheating. Its pretty constant. They claim to have banned over 60 000 accounts for cheating but with over 4 million downloads thats just the ti of the ice berg. Lots of clipping through walls and other t. Fun game but until the cheating is addressed Id save my money.Follow Up (August 2017 almost 500 hours) While the cheating has been being addressed another note worthy con of this otherwise very fun game is the crate and key system they have implemented. While the game is still in early access the dev chose to attempt to build an in game economy to further profits before completeing the game. Now lets not be confused I fully support games that make microsales in games. Everyone has to eat. But with over 5 million downloads the dev is not worrying about putting food on the table at this point. More attention should be focused on completeing this game before attempting to turn more profits. When that happens is when my review changes from "Not Recommended" to "Recommended".

review: For those who's considering purshase this game DON'T.Well not for the reason of the game content the game itself is great and could be the one that I ever play this long.but the hacker/cheating issue and mostly the way support team respond to it.my friends and I had a lot of good time playing this game but there's players cheating almost in every rounds we hate hacker but the support team seems having no progress/issue of these problem untill today my friend's account got banned from nothing we contact the support team and we got this Hello Survivor Thank you for contacting PUBG Support.It seems that you have recently submitted multiple tickets to support regarding the same issue. For efficiency and to keep all information organized in one spot we have merged all tickets to one and will address all concerns here. This helps us expedite our replies to you and helps makes sure things aren't missed across multiple tickets.It looks like you are seeing a restriction error message on the account.We understand that this may be a very frustrating experience. However please understand that a restriction is placed because we have determined that there was a violation of our terms and services.Please note that even without having any programs specifically for hacking/cheating there are other programs or actions that can violate our Rules of Conduct and cause a permanent restriction. Software that bypasses the services in the game Programs that alter the game in any way (even if it is not for cheating) Cheats macros etc. for other games and not for PUBG is still a violation of the game s servicesHaving purchases low KPD short gameplay time etc. does not exclude any accounts from restrictions.We can assure you that the account was blocked because there was a violation discovered on the account. We apologize but we cannot provide any specifics on the details of the violation.We have also implemented a 24 hour investigation period to ensure that there are no false bans. Therefore we do not accept any requests for rechecking account restrictions. However we also constantly check our systems for false bans and if found we correct any issues internally.We ask for your understanding of this situation.We will continue our work to make sure that no erroneous restrictions are made and continue creating a fair gaming environment for all BATTLEGROUNDS players.PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS NOT JUST A GAME THIS IS BATTLE ROYALEBasically they're telling you to f*ck off it's something in your computer thats having a issue and yet we're not going to tell you what it is they don't care if you're using hack well you wanna play the game still try press that purchase buttom again .I'm not the one who's been ban but I can't play with my friends because of "something" in their program thats completely not hacking So I recommend you there's a New game's called "Fortnite" and I'm going to try that and for PUBG keep having fun with you're cheating falles )

This is a great game a very small percentage of the community is toxic and unwelcoming. But the basics is to fly over a map and skydive into houses loot than and kill other players while trying to out run the blue cricle with slowly kills you. This happens untill you all die. But every part of this game is unique from most titles I have seen out there there are a lot of reliable weapons to choose from and fight with. There are lots of attatchments to perfect your gun the way you like it. There are also hundereds of ways to play it but most people fall into one of two catagories. Those who play to get high kill counts and those who play to win.

review: i've never actually used steam's review system to give a real opinion on a game before but this game sucks so here we go pubg is a great concept but it's got so much stuff dragging it down that it just isn't fun. looking aside all technical problems and just focusing on gameplay pubg matches are terrible paced. that circle should be closing in way faster than it currently does to keep players constantly on the move and to combat the boring "im going to sit in the corner of this house with a gun and wait for someone to walk in" mentality.i think the maps are far too big for what they are too with them mostly just being the same 10 buildings copied and pasted several times across a big plain and boring playing field with maybe two or three bigger structures thrown in for good measure. all the large map size does is make it harder to run into other players making the entire experience more boring than fun.theirs also the godawful lootbox system which (for me at least) just makes the game feel like a grind to get more and more of them.so yeah. i don't like it very much. hm.

review: Hands down the best game I've played all year.There are bugs. The game crashes. My computer doesn't handle the memory leak very well nor does it really hold up to the demands of the game. But it's playable. It's fun. It's amazing.$30 is a bargain. I bought this game last week and have already played over 30 hours. When I measure entertainment value I compare it to a trip to the theater which often costs $5 to $10 per hour sometimes more if you go for snacks. At that comparison this is the most financially responsible $30 I've spent in a long time.It's still early access and the game continues to improve. With new modes and new maps coming soon I think it's irresponsible not to buy this game immediately if you are even somewhat interested. Get a microphone get 3 friends and go hog wild.I'll be plunking the bats for the foreseeable future.

review: After playing both Arma 3 Battle Royale Mod &amp H1Z1 King Of The Kill...I Think PUBG falls right in the middle ground between these games. Arma 3 being to simulated which is not a bad thing mind you and H1Z1 KOTK being far too arcade like. PUBG is a perfect mix of these 2 games being realistic and casual at the same time. Yes the game is early access and tweaks are needed whci the developers work on in weekly and monthly updates and considering the game is not optimised it is alot more optimised since release to early access. I can recommend this game currently as it will be come a big hit once it is finished

review: PUBG is some of the most fun I've had with friends.That said I have to write a negative review like so many others. The gunplay in PUBG is mediocre vehicles are illogical at best and the game is too rife with cheaters for me to recommend this right now. There are so many that it's no longer fun. Of the last 3 games in which my friends and I made top 20 I was killed by clear cheaters twice. (Once by un scoped AWM through a tree at 500m the other time by someone staring directly at their feet while firing 15 rounds with the mini14.)I started playing Rainbow 6 Siege in October I think I'll return there. I'll still love PUBG when goofing off with friends. Planning the jump looting and strategizing is great fun but overall this is a poor game.
